edu.cnm.deepdive.abq_film_tour_backend.controller

Class UserCommentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.abq_film_tour_backend.controller.UserCommentController

  • @RestController
 @ExposesResourceFor(value=UserComment.class)
 @RequestMapping(value="/user_comments")
public class UserCommentController
extends Object
    Controller class for the User Comment entity, child of Film Location, requires a User.

             produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<UserComment> post(@RequestBody

        Posts a new user comment. Posting should not be done directly, it should be done on a specific FilmLocation endpoint.
        Parameters:
        userComment - the user comment
        Returns:
        the response entity
